Reviews.Title: “Average hotel but very poor service!”
Reviews.Author: Savya_31
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights week 10 mins taxi dubai airport served fresh juice reception checked 1100 pm local time drinking water called service twice reception bottle water didnt arrived hour enraged lift water handed 15 liter bottle charged 12 dhs seven times local supermarket price 175 dhs paid 100 night didnt bottle free water costs 50 cents disgusting bathroom fittings condition hotel clean breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Nice for $50 a day”
Reviews.Author: Darshanik1
Reviews.Content: visited dec 2009 landed airport cab hotel 3 adults 2 kids booked tried adjacent spacious clean nice hotel situated near metro station getting train easy hotel main road helped getting taxi easily 100 mtrs walk takes nice eating joins mcd pizza hut shopping mall situated near hotel … yes taj hotel opposite hotel stay location staff ok food disappointment option veg super market bang opposite till late night 24 hous swimming pool top nice view city dos buy water hotel supermarket opposite buy metro ticket valid 6 months metro connected dubai starts late late plan accordingly friday holiday desert safari overall 610

Reviews.Title: “good hotel , good band”
Reviews.Author: funwhguy
Reviews.Content: stay convience al rigga price metro station steps comfortable nice blue collar guy nightclub called rockies enjoyable experience band managed iwould stay plan december malls food close walking distance ya

Reviews.Title: “Ok hotel for convenience and budget needs”
Reviews.Author: chingy79
Reviews.Content: stayed 1 night moved hotel near al rigga metro stop handy noise till 3am cause clubs pubs hotel floors ground floor porters helpful females reception deal secure leave luggage handy breakfast terrible
